data.name: The Detective
data.detailed_description:
A family celebration is approaching at the home of one of the members of London's financiers - Christmas, traditionally celebrated with grandeur. On this occasion, his daughter and her husband, cousins ​​and friends appear at the estate. Unfortunately - where young people and a lot of money, there are a lot of emotions and feelings. Hazel Launton, a longtime friend of the family, dies in mysterious circumstances. Why? What was the murderer's motive? And finally - who did it? And will anyone else die?

Become a detective, plunge into the world of mystery and solve the mystery.

Ask the residents of the house questions - every detail can be important! People lie sometimes, remember this - in your notebook, you can denote whether you think the information provided is true or not. The further development of the situation will depend on this,

While collecting information from residents, you will come across traces leading to specific places - search them to find more facts and items. They can provide important clues. Sometimes it is enough to examine the item to obtain further information. Sometimes, however, you will have to use one item on another to find out its secret. Remember that a detective follows even the strangest tips.

data.short_description: Detective vintage game. Ask questions, search for clues, and items. Objects can tell stories too. In your notebook, you will mark who is lying and who is telling the truth.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Graphics: Any decent graphics card

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any distribution
  • Graphics: Any decent graphics card
